Kiosk Mode

Kiosk Enabled

Whether the packaged app is designed to expected to work in ChromeOS kiosk mode. If "kiosk_mode" is true, the platform app window will cover the entire surface of the display (forced full screen). The kiosk-enabled apps are expected to be designed with this constraint in mind.

Kiosk Only

Whether the packaged app is only intended to be installed and run in ChromeOS kiosk mode. This field is only valid if the "kiosk_enabled" field is true.
